channel.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! - Eclipsedz
channel.description:
Ok people I have my server and client now complete after my 1 year and 4 months work I have finished making them both the client was made using bluurs client anyway getting down to buisness I fail at making webclients nevertheless I am good with editing clients or making clients..
What I need help with:
I need help making my client into a webclient and then getting the webclient onto my website..
comments/emailing me/or sending me a pm if you can help me I will be very grateful - Im logged in most of the time on live messenger on this email GabrielPereira190@live.co.uk or you can send a message to this emails inbox GabrielPereira910@live.co.uk THANK YOU! :)

item.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! - Eclipsedz
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
item.description:
@Eclipsedz wrote:

To be honest if your not going to say anything constructive that will help me then you can fuck off
just because your too shit at rs coding you feel you need to try it with me
well guess what?
todays news is fuck off you ass licker
LOl

item.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! - Eclipsedz
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
item.description:
@Eclipsedz wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:2, topic:374697”]You are not “good with making clients” if you’re not even capable of editing an existent one into a webclient.

And as for this:

I have my server and client now complete after my 1 year and 4 months work

Oh Please…

And as for these things:

I need help making my client into a webclient
and then getting the webclient onto my website…

There a numerous tutorials in the Client Development section. If you have a more specific question, feel free to ask it.[/quote]

Thanks for no help at all if you want to comment or judge me then fine but you can suck my balls because you dont know me and you dont know anything about me and if you can read at all I said “I have tryed many tutorials already!”
you stupid idiot get off my thread :L

Read full topic

item.title: Ok I NEED SERIOUS WEBCLIENT HELP! - Eclipsedz

item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

You are not “good with making clients” if you’re not even capable of editing an existent one into a webclient.

And as for this:

Eclipsedz:

I have my server and client now complete after my 1 year and 4 months work

Oh Please…

And as for these things:

[quote=“Eclipsedz, post:1, topic:374697”]I need help making my client into a webclient
and then getting the webclient onto my website…[/quote]
There a numerous tutorials in the Client Development section. If you have a more specific question, feel free to ask it.
